title: As a Pressbox administrator, I want to be able to access a table where I can view and edit Pressbox users.
As a Pressbox Admin, I want different Pressbox users to have different entitlements
custom_preconds: Created 3 email addresses with 3 different permissions
custom_steps: Once the new pages are available (Basic content, headshots, MiLB Downloads), we can use these email addresses above to validate users are able to access the following:
custom_expected:
(Basic - should be able to log in and see content)
 (Basic + headshots - should be able to download player images from the Club Rosters)
(Basic + Headshot + MiLB Download) - Should be able to download images and view/download MiLB Downloads)
 (Basic + MiLB Downloads)

title: As a user, I want to receive an email once I have been granted access to MLB pressbox
custom_expected:
After revoking user, user is displayed on the Revoked tab

After approving user, page should display in Active tab without refreshing
User receives email notification on activation
View Site takes user to Login page

title: As a Pressbox Admin, I want the ability to search up existing users.
custom_steps: User can search up existing users
custom_expected:
Lower case should have the same results as Upper case now
User should be able to click on the users
Dropdown bar in Search should display

title: As a Pressbox Admin, I want the ability to reject/revoke potential new users.
custom_expected:
Revoke User button should be displayed to Admin
Clicking or tapping opens up page of fields: First and Last Name, Email
Revoke button will save and reject applicant

title: As a Pressbox Admin, I want to be able to see all the users that have access to MLB Pressbox.
custom_expected:
When I open the application all users are seen in list order
Have the ability to sort by: Email, First or Last Name, Access Granted to the User
Be able to scroll from top to bottom of the list

title: As a Pressbox Admin, I would like the ability to edit existing users
custom_expected:
When selecting a user on the search screen, Modal appears that displays all user information
The profile appears with all information about the user
Admins have the ability to edit all information:
“Save' button saves all changes made
“Active/Inactive” option

title: As a Pressbox Admin, I want to be able to add users to the Pressbox user group.
custom_expected:
Add user button is added to Admin
Clicking/tapping opens up New User modal Fields for
Clicking/tapping save adds them to the database

title: As a user, I want to receive an email once I have been granted access to MLB pressbox.
custom_steps:
Grant a user access to MLB pressbox
Check user email
custom_expected:
Once user is granted access, send an Email to the user confirming their approval
Email contains: 
MLB header
To: Email address of user that was approved
From: pressboxhelp@mlb.com
Subject Line: Your MLB Pressbox request has been approved
Body copy: 
Thank you for applying for access to MLB Pressbox. Your request has been approved.
To access MLB + Club Pressbox, please log in to your MLB.com account.
Note that approval to MLB Pressbox does not guarantee access or approval to individual Club media credentials.

SIGN IN Button that links to Pressbox Login page
Test emails sent to DIBEST team

title: As a potential new Pressbox user, I want to register through a form.
custom_steps: Register a new Pressbox user thru the form
custom_expected:
A potential user selects the sign up button on MLB Pressbox log in screen - Directs you to an MLB.com registration screen. 
Once logged in or registered through MLB.com
EX: Pressbox Registration
Registration Form appears which includes
First Name
Last Name
Job Title
Organization
Email 

Should already be filled out with MLB.com email
Phone Number
City
State
Zip Code

All Data should be mandatory before submission

Info should be saved temporarily before Admin approves or denies registration
